about.description: libslirp is a user-mode networking library used by virtual machines, containers or various tools.
about.summary: A general purpose TCP-IP emulator used by virtual machine hypervisors to provide virtual networking services.

about.description: libslirp is a user-mode networking library used by virtual machines, containers or various tools.
about.summary: A general purpose TCP-IP emulator used by virtual machine hypervisors to provide virtual networking services.

name: libslirp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.4.0" %}

package:
  name: libslirp
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  # url: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/slirp/libslirp/-/archive/v{{ version }}/libslirp-v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/slirp/libslirp/uploads/a30aeca3c6ad23f176065d0ee832957b/libslirp-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: e903fc14c26030b51711bd7f098697c2393f237199e3681c2e22ea013c3635a7

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [not linux]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('libslirp', max_pin='x.x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - meson >=0.50
    - ninja
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - glib
    # Header+pkgconfig files for libglib are in the glib package.
    - libglib
  run:

test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/slirp/libslirp.h
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libslirp${SHLIB_EXT}
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig/slirp.pc

about:
  home: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/slirp/libslirp
  dev_url: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/slirp/libslirp
  doc_url: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/slirp/libslirp
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: COPYRIGHT
  summary: A general purpose TCP-IP emulator used by virtual machine hypervisors to provide virtual networking services.
  description: >
    libslirp is a user-mode networking library used by virtual machines, containers or various tools.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mbargull
